title: League wont launch after I hit "launch"
body: I've had this issue for over a year now, and I have barley got to play. I'm now reposting this because MAYBE there's a solution now. When I open my league launcher and go into the client, and then hit launch, the button goes dark and then does nothing. This has been a problem for the longest time and I wish I could fix it. I've done everything I can to fix it and I'm out of ideas. Any help would be appreciated!

replies.body: Try right click - run as administrator

This reappearing launch button can happen when a security setting on your OS is preventing the patcher from loading or scanning game files.  Run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings and allow that access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
